com.blahti.example.drag2

Class DragActivityV2

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.blahti.example.drag2.DragActivityV2

  • This activity presents a screen on which images can be added and moved around. It also defines areas on the screen where the dragged views can be dropped. Feedback is provided to the user as the objects are dragged over these drop zones.

    Like the DragActivity in the previous version of the DragView example application, the code here is derived from the Android Launcher code.

      • onTouch

        public boolean onTouch(View v,
              MotionEvent ev)
        This is the starting point for a drag operation if mLongClickStartsDrag is false. It looks for the down event that gets generated when a user touches the screen. Only that initiates the drag-drop sequence.
